original_text: Some people continue to trust God even when troubles happen. God will bless those people, if they show that they really trust him. He will give them the gift which is life with him. He has promised to give this gift to all people who love him.
korean_text: 시험을 참는 자는 복이 있나니 이는 시련을 견디어 낸 자가 주께서 자기를 사랑하는 자들에게 약속하신 생명의 면류관을 얻을 것이기 때문이라

sentences.original_text: Some people continue to trust God

sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 그 사람들을 복 주실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: if they show that they really trust him
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 정말로 그를 신뢰한다는 것을 보여준다면

sentences.original_text: He will give them the gift
He has promised to give this gift
to all people who love him
